column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Horrible service.  Went on a Tuesday night
column2: waited at least 15 minutes for waitress to bring our beers.  She barely spoke to us when taking our order and even worse
column3: raced past our table as to not have to speak to us if not necessary.  Food delivered in an hour- 45 min was what she quoted. Again
column4: Tuesday night and not a full house.  Pizza was absolutely disappointing. I could have ordered Domino's and got better pizza. The crust was gooey and undercooked while the bottom of the crust-burned.  Such a waste of time and money.
